data.name: ConfigServerUrlSubLabel
data.value: You can connect to the official Epistle server for free or to a custom server.

data.name: ConfigServerUrlTitleLabel
data.value: Please connect to the Epistle server.

data.name: ConnectionToServerFailed
data.value: The connection to the specified Epistle server could not be established.

data.name: ConnectionToServerFailedErrorMsg
data.value: Could not connect to the Epistle server. Please make sure to have a working, active internet connection and double check the server url!

data.name: DoNotTellSecretToAnyone
data.value: Do not tell this secret code to anyone!

data.name: HereAreYourBackupCodes
data.value: Here are your two-factor authentication emergency backup codes. Store these somewhere safe (possibly disconnected from the internet) and DO NOT SHARE them with anybody!

data.name: KeyGenerationFailed
data.value: There was an unexpected error whilst generating the RSA key pair (during user creation process).

data.name: PleaseBackup2FASecret
data.value: This is your two-factor authentication secret. Back it up somewhere safe, because you'll need it if you lose your 2FA device.

data.name: PleaseEnterUsernameDialogTextLabel
data.value: Messages will be sent using this name. This can be anything, but it's recommended to keep the same username as long as possible for other convo participants to easily identify you.

data.name: PleaseSetUp2FALabel
data.value: Please set up your 2FA authenticator app.

data.name: PleaseVerify2FA
data.value: Please enter your 2FA code for verification:

data.name: UserCreationFailedClientSideButSucceededServerSide
data.value: The user creation succeeded server-side but there was an unexpected client-side error whilst handling the user creation server response.

data.name: UserCreationFailedServerSide
data.value: The user creation process failed server-side. Please double check the server URL and make sure that the user creation secret is correct!

data.name: PleaseEnterGoodUsernameLabel
data.value: Hint: A good username is short, catchy and one that makes you easily recognizable by other convo participants.
data.comment: Hint: A good username is short, catchy and one that makes you easily recognizable by other convo participants.

data.name: AboutText
data.value:
Glitched Epistle Mobile Client v{0}
Glitched Polygons https://glitchedpolygons.com

data.name: SettingsAutoSaveReminder
data.value:
These settings don't require manual saving (they're saved automatically as you're editing them).
Reverting to default settings will also apply them immediately. Are you sure that you want this?

data.name: LanguageChangeRestartRequiredLabel
data.value: Changing the language setting requires the Epistle app to be restarted in order for the modification to take effect!

data.name: ChangePasswordDescriptionLabel
data.value:
It's very easy, and important that you do it every now and then!
To change your password, enter your current one in the field below and then double-enter your new desired password right after. Authenticate your request by entering your Two-Factor Authentication token and voilà, you're done! Password changed, safely and swiftly.
Good passwords are at least 8 characters long and contain some degree of special symbols, numbers and mixed uppercase and lowercase letters.
data.comment:
It's very easy, and important that you do it every now and then!
To change your password, enter your current one in the field below and then double-enter your new desired password right after. Authenticate your request by entering your Two-Factor Authentication token and voilà, you're done! Password changed, safely and swiftly.
Good passwords are at least 8 characters long and contain some degree of special symbols, numbers and mixed uppercase and lowercase letters.

data.name: InvalidUserIdPwOrTOTP
data.value: Error! Invalid user id, password or 2FA.

data.name: LoginFailedClientSide
data.value: Unexpected ERROR! Login succeeded server-side, but the returned response couldn't be handled properly (probably key decryption failure).

data.name: LoginMultiFailedAttemptsErrorMessage
data.value: Note that if your credentials are correct but login fails nonetheless, it might be that you're locked out due to too many failed attempts and/or expired (or already used) two-factor authentication tokens! Please try again in 15 minutes.
data.comment: Note that if your credentials are correct but login fails nonetheless, it might be that you're locked out due to too many failed attempts and/or expired (or already used) two-factor authentication tokens! Please try again in 15 minutes.

data.name: NoTotpProvidedErrorMessage
data.value: No 2FA token provided - please authenticate your request!

data.name: PasswordChangeRequestFailedServerSideErrorMessage
data.value: Password change request failed: please double-check all fields and try again!
data.comment: Password change request rejected server-side: perhaps invalid 2FA token?

data.name: PasswordFieldsInvalid
data.value: The password fields are empty or don't match where they need to match.
data.comment: The password fields are null, empty or don't match where they need to match.

data.name: PasswordTooWeakErrorMessage
data.value: Your password is too weak; make sure that it has at least >{0} characters!

data.name: PleaseEnterTotpSecretDialogTextLabel
data.value:
In order for the Epistle app to generate 2FA tokens for you, it needs to know your Two-Factor Authentication secret that you received when you first created this account (when the page with the QR-Code was displayed).
No worries: it will be stored in encrypted form using your device's SecureStorage provider. If you feel unsure about this and/or want to keep the token generation source away from the client app (which is what 2FA is actually all about), you don't need to enable this. This feature is here for pure comfort reasons only!
Please note that if you do not know or have forgot your 2FA secret, you're out of luck and you cannot enable this option. Just make sure not to lose your 2FA device... take care!

data.name: EmptyConvoIdFieldErrorMessage
data.value: The convo id field is empty.

data.name: JoinConvoDescriptionLabel
data.value:
To join a convo, you need its unique id and password.
The convo administrator (or one of the participants) should have given you these credentials over a secure communication channel.

data.name: JoinConvoFailedErrorMessage
data.value: Couldn't join convo. Please double check the credentials and try again. If that's not the problem, then the convo might have expired, deleted or you've been kicked out of it.
data.comment: Couldn't join convo. Please double check the credentials and try again. If that's not the problem, then the convo might have expired, deleted or you've been kicked out of it. Sorry :/

data.name: AutoCopyIdAfterSuccessfulConvoCreation
data.value: Copy convo id to clipboard after creation

data.name: ConvoCreationFailedErrorMessage
data.value: Convo "{0}" couldn't be created. Perhaps due to unsuccessful Two-Factor Authentication: please double check the provided 2FA token and try again.

data.name: ConvoMetadataChangeRequestRejected
data.value: Convo metadata change request was rejected. Perhaps you provided the wrong password or invalid data? Please double check the form.

data.name: CreateConvoDescriptionLabel
data.value:
Create a new conversation to which other Epistle users can connect to. After the convo's expiration date, it will be irreversably purged from the server, deleting all traces.
Other users need the convo's unique id and its password in order to connect to it, please remember to provide them with this information over a secure communication channel.
data.comment:
Create a new conversation to which other Epistle users can connect to. After the convo's expiration date, it will be irreversably purged from the server, deleting all traces.
Other users need the convo's unique id and its password in order to connect to it, please remember to provide them with this information over a secure communication channel.

data.name: EmptyConvoTitleFieldErrorMessage
data.value: Convo title field is empty, please give your conversation a descriptive name for others to recognize!

data.name: PasswordsDontMatchErrorMessage
data.value: The two entered passwords don't match.

data.name: PleaseEnterConvoPassword
data.value: Please enter the convo password to join.

data.name: CantLeaveConvoAsAdminErrorMessage
data.value: You are the administrator of this convo. In maritime tradition, the captain goes down with his ship. If you really want to leave your own convo, you need to elect a new administrator from the participants list. In this case, not because this is a ship, but because the server's database requires it...
data.comment: You are the administrator of this convo. In maritime tradition, the captain goes down with his ship. If you really want to leave your own convo, you need to elect a new administrator from the participants list. In this case, not because this is a ship, but because the server's database requires it.

data.name: ChangeConvoAdminDialogMessage
data.value:
Are you sure that you want to make the user "{0}" the new administrator of the convo "{1}"?
Please be aware that you lose all admin rights after confirming this, and unless the new admin agrees, you can not revert this.
data.comment:
Are you sure that you want to make the user "{0}" the new administrator of the convo "{1}"?
Please be aware that you lose all admin rights after confirming this, and unless the new admin agrees, you can not revert this.

data.name: ConvoMetadataChangeRequestMissingPassword
data.value: Please enter the convo's current password to authenticate your request!

data.name: DeleteConvoConfirmationDialogMessage
data.value: Last warning! This is your last opportunity to prevent IMMEDIATE DELETION of the convo "{0}". This action CANNOT BE UNDONE!

data.name: DeleteConvoDialogMessage
data.value:
Are you sure that you want to delete the convo "{0}"?
Be aware that by confirming the deletion, all participants are immediately denied access and the entire conversation including all of its content, metadata and messages are deleted IRREVERSIBLY!
data.comment:
Are you sure that you want to delete the convo "{0}"?
Be aware that by confirming the deletion, all participants are immediately denied access and the entire conversation including all of its content, metadata and messages are deleted IRREVERSIBLY!

data.name: KickAndBanUserFromConvoDialogMessage
data.value: Are you sure that you want to kick the user "{0}" out from the convo "{1}"? He or she will be banned forever from this conversation, and this is IRREVERSIBLE!

data.name: LeaveConvoDialogMessage
data.value: Are you sure that you want to leave the convo "{0}"?

data.name: LongPressedMessageTextDescription
data.value: Do you want to copy the message's text to the clipboard?

data.name: MessageTooLargeFailureMessage
data.value: Your message couldn't be uploaded to the Epistle Web API because it exceeds the maximum file size limit.

data.name: MessageUploadFailureMessage
data.value: Your message couldn't be uploaded to the Epistle Web API!

data.name: PleaseProvideConvoPassword
data.value: Please provide the convo's current password in order to authenticate your request!
data.comment: Please provide the convo's current password in order to authenticate your request!

data.name: RequestFailedServerSide
data.value: The request could not be fulfilled server-side; please double check the provided parameters.

data.name: AbortedDueToStoragePermissionDeclined
data.value: Cancelled due to rejected storage permission

data.name: StoragePermissionNeededForDownloadingAttachmentText
data.value: Glitched Epistle needs access to your device's storage in order to fulfill your request of downloading a message's attachment.

data.name: DownloadAttachmentDialogText
data.value:
Are you sure that you want to download the attachment of {0} to the following destination path:
{1}

data.name: FileAlreadyExistsDialogText
data.value: Do you want to overwrite the already existing file "{0}"?
data.comment: Do you want to overwrite the already existing file "{0}"?

data.name: OpenAttachmentDialogText
data.value: Do you want to open the file "{0}"?

data.name: ConfirmAttachmentUploadDialogText
data.value: Are you sure that you want to upload the file "{0}" to the convo?

data.name: AbortedDueToMicrophonePermissionDeclined
data.value: Cancelled due to rejected microphone permission

data.name: MicrophonePermissionNeededForRecordingAudioAttachmentText
data.value: Glitched Epistle needs access to your device's microphone in order to fulfill your request of recording a new audio message.

data.name: AudioLoadFailedErrorMessageText
data.value: The specified audio attachment cannot be played back.
